generalInfo:
Vietnam Intro is the most amazing way to experience Vietnam in 9 or 12 days!

You’ll discover crazy Hanoi, experience the stunning Ha Long Bay, go sea kayaking, crab fishing with traditional fisherman, soak up the fascinating local culture, learn to cook delicious Vietnamese food, discover the secret underground world used during the Vietnam War known as the Cu Chi tunnels, explore the vast maze of rivers and lush green rice fields of the famous Mekong Delta and visit a traditional local village and much more. Plus you’ll have an awesome Group Leader with you from the moment you step off the plane, an instant group of friends to share your adventure with and help with all your onward travel. Get ready for the trip of a lifetime!

9 DAY: Hanoi - Hoi An
12 DAY: Hanoi - Ho Chi Minh

HIGHLIGHTS

- Immerse yourself in the culture, food and fast paced living of fascinating Hanoi.
- Experience the stunning natural wonder of Ha Long Bay!
- Experience the beautiful countryside of Ninh Binh during a local homestay among the rice paddies.
- Learn how the locals live in the incredibly lush green beauty of the Mekong Delta before discovering the fascinating and eyeopening Cu Chi Tunnels. (12 day only)


INCLUSIONS.

dayInfo.description: ARRIVE IN HANOI. When you land in Hanoi after your long flight we’ll be at the airport to meet you and take you to our accommodation. You’ll have plenty of time to recover from your flight, chill out and meet everyone in your group.

DISCOVER HANOI. Discover what makes the chaotic capital of Vietnam so special with a walking and rickshaw tour of the city. Experience the bustling streets, fascinating culture and delicious street food. We’ll then head out for dinner and experience some of Hanoi’s best nightlife! (B)

HA LONG BAY OVERNIGHT BOAT. Experience the stunning natural wonder of Ha Long Bay, cruise on beautiful emerald green waters through towering limestone mountains topped with rainforest. Go kayaking through caves and enjoy some drinks aboard our overnight boat! (B, L, D)

NINH BINH HOMESTAY. Today we head south to the beautiful countryside of Ninh Binh, a landscape of endless rice paddies and epic limestone mountains. Check in to our unique and amazing local homestay, relaxing in our private riverside bungalows for the evening. (B)

EXPLORE NINH BINH a bike ride through the rice paddies and then a local row boat along with a network of rivers and caves. We’ll then tackle the iconic Dragon Mountain Viewpoint before boarding the overnight train south to Hoi An. (B)

EXPLORE HOI AN. In the morning we’ll arrive in Hoi An, one of the most beautiful and fascinating towns in Vietnam. You’ll have some time in the afternoon to chill out, go shopping or even get some clothes made! This evening we'll experience the iconic lantern boats.

BASKET FISHING & COOKING CLASS. Be guided through coconut groves by local fishermen while you try your hand at some crab fishing! We’ll then learn the secrets of preparing delicious Vietnamese food with a traditional cooking class.
LANTERN MAKING & BEACH DAY. This morning we'll learn how to make lanterns. We'll then enjoy a chilled day at a beach club. That evening we'll head out for dinner together. (B)

HO CHI MINH CITY. Today we catch a short flight to Ho Chi Minh City and arrive early afternoon. You’ll have the rest of the day to relax and explore the city. (B) The 9 day trip finishes in Hoi An today. Your Group Leader will help you with your onward travel.

LOCAL LIFE ON THE MEKONG DELTA. We’ll explore the incredibly lush green beauty of the Mekong Delta, learn first-hand how the locals live, visit local villages and experience daily life on the Mekong. We then stay overnight in the Delta. (B, L, D)

CU CHI TUNNELS. Today we discover the Cu Chi Tunnels, a fascinating network of underground tunnels used as supply routes, hideouts and living quarters during the Vietnam War. We’ll arrive back to Ho Chi Minh City in the afternoon before heading out for our farewell dinner and party! (B, L)

DEPART HO CHI MINH CITY OR EXTEND YOUR STAY. Your amazing 12-day adventure comes to an end. You can either check out and make your way back home, stay on longer in Vietnam or continue your travels with our help & the new friends you’ve made.
